actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Select Revenue Measures.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that interest credited on a deposit or account in a bank or other financial institution shall not be included in income if such interest cannot be withdrawn because of a bankruptcy or other insolvency proceeding.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that interest credited on a deposit or account in a bank or other financial institution shall not be included in income if such interest cannot be withdrawn because of bankruptcy or other solvency proceedings.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that interest credited on a deposit or account in a bank or other financial institution shall not be included in income if such interest cannot be withdrawn because of a bankruptcy or other insolvency proceeding.
